page.title: 04My house
page.content: My house is in Hatton which is near Warrington. It is in a group of houses but is detached. It was built around the 1950's or 60's. It is quite modern. It was built by a man called Dale and has quite a lot of land to it. It has not been converted and is still exactly the same size as when it was built. It has 4 rooms on the ground floor not including the hall. Upstairs there are 5 rooms not including the landing. The garage is attached to the house and is a double garage. In the garage we keep the washing machine and the spin drier. Our house is made of bricks and has cavity wall insulation. It is just a normal colour. We have solid fuel cental heating with a heater in every room. The boiler is in the kitchen along with a cooker, fridge, freezer and sandwich toaster.
